metadata.name: Account Disabled or Blocked for Sign in Attempts
metadata.comment: Detects when an account is disabled or blocked for sign in but tried to log in

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (status_id = 50057 AND lower(status_detail) = lower('failure'))

output.summary: Detects when an account is disabled or blocked for sign in but tried to log in

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Account disabled or blocked in error 2. Automation account has been blocked or disabled Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-gb/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-accounts
